ValidationRule.description: (US:12084) To ensure multiple CIRs are not sent out when the status is Pending Customer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c,"Customer Information Request"), ISPICKVAL(Parent.Status,"Pending Customer") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There is still an outstanding CIR. You can use Email Type "Update" to send additional information.
